title: Welcome to the Salty Spitoon. How tough are ya?
body:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/67Lz9FtfGcc/maxresdefault.jpg

How tough I am? How tough I am?

I managed to climb from Bronze V to Challenger.

**Yeah, so?**

Only playing support! {{champion:16}} {{item:3069}} {{item:2045}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3050}} 

**Uh, right this way, sorry to keep you waiting.**

replies.body:
How tough am I?
I once put my opinion on the boards.
_So?_
**On GD.**
_Right this way sir._

How tough am I?
I once got a level 6 pentakill.
**As proxy Singed, in the enemy base**
Proxy?

When instead of sitting in the lane and last hitting, you run around between the enemy towers to get your farm, intercepting the minion waves.

The manliest of singed players do so in the enemy base, farming the minion waves from both top and mid.

> [{quoted}](name=The True Bard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KPhrsQYq,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-11-03T00:29:50.654+0000)
>
> The manliest of singed players do so in the enemy base, farming the minion waves from both top and mid.

False. The manliest of Singeds realize that it is up to them to solo carry the game and farm top, mid, and bot lanes inside the enemy base.

Those are not manly men.

Those are gods.

False. They are men.

Gods manage to get jungle farm.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rloho6R-GzA
I thought this was a hack?
IIRC it was a combination of a hack and a glitch in the masteries for summoner spell CD. (Which enabled the hack.) Long time ago though. I had forgotten buffs used to spawn after monsters.
it is
And that's why we hate Singed.
proxy is so fucking annoying all you do as singed is use his poison to kill minions when they are on the way to base

I.

Annie.

Is that you Shatner?
No, clearly. If... hewasShatnerhe'd... be talking... muchmorelikethis, since....... he... isn'thoweveritseems he's... channeling... his... innerStephenHawkingperhaps?
I'll have you know I played a game with verbally abusive teammates without muting and I only cried for twenty minutes.

How tough am I? How tough am I?

*Yeah, so?*

*Uh, right this way, sorry to keep you waiting.*

---------

How tough am I? How tough am I?

I managed to dodge an {{champion:81}} ult as {{champion:117}}!

*Yeah, so?*

I had retreated into the enemy jungle after helping kill off 4 of their members in their own base, with 10hp left!.

*Uh huh.....and?*

With no vision in the jungle, i stopped mid-teleport to move to another bush out of **PURE INTUITION** after realizing that the enemy ez never used his ult during that team fight!......while i was teleporting, i saw the ez ult fly right over the bush that i initially tried to use teleport to base from.

*Uh, right this way, sorry to keep you waiting.*

You made me remember of two times I stole the baron.

In one, I was using {{champion:117}} mid. I polymorphed the enemy {{champion:121}} (thus preventing him from using Smite) then I used "Help, Pix" on him, and used Glitterlance to stole the baron.

In the other, I was using {{champion:154}} support. Enemy {{champion:32}} and {{champion:236}} were almost finishing off the Baron, when I suddenly used "Elastic Slingshot" to jump on them and then I ulted. Managed to sucessfully stole the Baron, despite the fact that, as a support, I didn't have any offensive items, runes, or masteries.

could you give me some tips on how to play nami?
she is the only support that i cannot play well
i can get my carry ridiculously fed on any other support

why do you need the ludens? exactly
most supports i play encourage a tanky build such as bard or thresh

http://s3.roosterteeth.com/images/ahwaffles51a817f125583.jpg

You don't necessarily need ludens, but that or rabbadons is a good way to deal some damage late game. While tanky builds are ok for some supports (leona, tahm, and thresh) Bard and Nami can be built as utility supports. I modified my build above accordingly. That build provides your team with a lot of helpful things:

{{item:3092}}  allows you to slow people down as well as get you gold
{{item:3110}}  lowers enemies' attack speed
{{item:3050}}  helps out your binded teammate's damage output, as well as your own ({{item:3504}}  can work too)
{{item:3023}}  's active can scout areas ahead of you so you can safely use {{item:2049}}
